dataTemplate.name: BCO_SALES_CONTRACTS_2084
dataTemplate.description: BCO Sales Contracts In Last 7 Days - 2084, 2184, 2185

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT oob.order_base_xid contract_id, ROUND((ol.weight_base * 0.0004536),3) original_quantity, loc.location_name dest_location_name, loc.country_code3_gid dest_country, TO_CHAR(ol.early_pickup_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') begin_ship_date, TO_CHAR(ol.late_delivery_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') end_ship_date, oref1.ob_refnum_value loc_num, oref2.ob_refnum_value commodity, con.contact_xid customer_code, TO_CHAR(oob.insert_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') contract_entry_date, oref3.ob_refnum_value contract_price, oref4.ob_refnum_value contract_price_uom, oref5.ob_refnum_value payment_terms, oref6.ob_refnum_value tolerance_less, oref7.ob_refnum_value tolerance_more FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_line ol ON oob.order_base_gid = ol.order_base_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON ol.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' AND oref1.ob_refnum_value IN ('2084','2184','2185') INNER JOIN ob_refnum oref2 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref2.order_base_gid AND oref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' INNER JOIN ob_involved_party oip ON oob.order_base_gid = oip.order_base_gid AND oip.involved_party_qual_gid='CUSTOMER' INNER JOIN contact con ON oip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_Gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref3 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref3.order_base_gid AND oref3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTRACT_PRICE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref4 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref4.order_base_gid AND oref4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PRICE_UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref5 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref5.order_base_gid AND oref5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CUST PAYTERMS' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref6 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref6.order_base_gid AND oref6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.TOLERANCE_LESS' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref7 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref7.order_base_gid AND oref7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.TOLERANCE_MORE' WHERE oob.insert_date > SYSDATE - 7 AND oob.order_base_xid like 'S%' ORDER BY oob.insert_date ASC
